title: Spear Phishing
content: Spear phishing targets specific individuals or organizations with personalized messages to increase success rates.

title: Clone Phishing
content: Clone phishing replicates a legitimate email you've already received but replaces attachments or links with malicious versions.

title: Business Email Compromise (BEC)
content: Attackers impersonate executives or vendors to trick employees into transferring funds or sensitive data.

title: Pharming & Domain Spoofing
content: These methods redirect users to fake websites that look real, tricking them into entering login credentials.

title: Defensive Strategies
content: Implement multi-factor authentication, monitor for domain lookalikes, and conduct phishing awareness training regularly.
